content: All these problems are people and culture related. Kanban or any other form of visualization are tools that can help with the improvement and enable reflection and wouldn’t work without the culture being in place. An organisation needs the will to change and senior management buy in is very important. You brought the very important point of safety and that reminds me of westrum typology and the Google study of effective teams https://goo.gl/images/OEQqqP https://rework.withgoogle.com/blog/five-keys-to-a-successful-google-team/ Safety is the number one thing. People need to feel safe to become more transparent and collaborative.
